description: Construction of gable to front roofslope (involving conversion of front roofslope to habitable use); extension of existing basement (full width of property) including front and rear lightwells; ground floor side/rear wrap around extension; second floor rear extension; part rear roof extension over outrigger.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 215/2042/09 - Proposed Basement, Rev A; 215/2042/10 - Proposed Ground Floor, Rev A; 215/2042/11 - Proposed First Floor; 215/2042/12 - Proposed Second Floor, Rev B; 215/2042/13 - Proposed 3rd Floor/Existing/Proposed Roof Plan, Rev B;  215/2042/14 - Proposed Elevations to Street & Garden, Rev A; 215/2042/15 - Proposed Cross Section, Rev A; 215/2042/16 - Proposed Elevation along Boundary; 215/2042/17 - Proposed Elevation along Boundary, Rev B.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building or as depicted on the approved drawings.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012. | No part of the flat roof of the dwelling shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area. The windows proposed to the upper floor side and rear elevations are required to be obscure glazed and non-opening up to 1.7m above internal floor area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1(c) and 2.10  of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015). | The basement extension hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with policies LV 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, and 1.2 of the Adopted Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015). | The rating noise level emitted from the external plant and machinery at the proposed development, as assessed under BS4142: 2014, should not exceed the existing background sound level, as measured at the nearest noise sensitive facades.

Reason: In the interest of neighbouring occupiers and those of the development hereby approved, in accordance with policy 7.15 of the London Plan (2015), policy 1.1 (j) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
